phrases: Do you want to know more about what happened in Vladivostok?
The body of an MI6 agent,
and the illegal Japanese intelligence agency that is rumored to exist.
Actually, you know that better than me.
From the way you talk, you seem to know why BK201's star disappeared.
I heard some dangerous anti-contractor weapon was used.
As the name implies, it is a weapon that can take out contractors.
I believe you have seen something similar to the prototype two years ago.
Have you heard about the Mitaka document?
The thing you are looking for, that mysterious document, is in the hands of a certain organization.
How do you know what I am looking for?
Make a wish upon a star.
Upon a tiny, little, red star.
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
That they'feel it is good enough
Sore de ii to omoeru tte
if they are if happy today'
But that is also a distant memory
The time that is simply passing by-
Kore kara saki dou naru no darou?
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
The projectile is off by 2 cm.
Well, it is a pretty good shot from this distance.
Does that mean you can only use this monster three more times?
No, each time it manifests, I have one round in the chamber and five in my pocket.
It is just that I have to maintain it since the warping and scratches do not disappear.
You are pretty enthusiastic about this, young miss.
Are you going to pass on lunch and save money again?
I will not eat anything strange again.
I need to become stronger before I run away again.
And in order to realize that, I have to overcome my dislikes.
Did you hear that from your son?
I could tell without asking him.
Besides, Michiru-san was a contractor too.
I had the right to board Noah's Ark.
My parents nagged me on that too.
So I thought it would not be a bad experience to see the world.
She was good at making sweets.
I guess it happened when Norio was three.
She became a contractor, and by the time her personality started to deteriorate,
I wonder where she is and what she is doing now.
Have as much as you want.
The liver creates blood, you know.
I, who hath been born beneath the scorching and passionate star, have to finally remunerate...
Our meeting must be destiny at work!
What do you know about me anyway?
Tell me all about yourself, then.
You sparkle brighter than the fake stars in the sky.
Let us board Noah's Ark together!
It is not about the reward.
She will only slow me down.
She has a better aim with a rifle than I have, but...
I can do that mission alone.
Lebanon gave me an earthenware pot and gas burner.
When she opened it, there was a cockroach inside.
You are going to hit me again, are not you?
But in exchange, hit me on the left side.
The right side is still hurting from the last time.
I will not be able to move properly if there is no balance.
Hey, you will freeze to death.
It must be because of her friend.
Even though she is used to her new powers, what happened to her friend must really have shocked her.
She was saying things about love and stuff.
She was really worried about her friend.
I doubt there is anyone she likes though.
So I am the same as a cockroach, huh...
Guess this is the warmest room here.
Even though she is a contractor, there is no pattern in her behavior.
She did not lose interest in her hobbies, either.
There were too many things she did not know.
Perhaps she was not really what you would call an adult human.
And then she became a contractor.
A contractor who is accumulating social experiences...
She is probably accumulating more experience to help her make logical decisions.
But that is the only clue I have.
Chief Kobayashi is calling for you.
We want you to transport an important object from a facility in Sapporo.
I am here to chase after BK201.
Or are you saying there is more behind this order?
Of course there is a reason we cannot be careless.
We have been informed by our agent in Sapporo.
He spotted BK201 in the company of some kids.
The gunpowder is drifting away, so is the life...
One of them is a contractor.
You three escape through the entrance while they are distracted.
We will regroup at the usual place.
According to the family register, Shion Pavlichenko had a twin sister.
But we know nothing about her.
She might have been killed by the FSB.
If the person with BK201 is truly a girl...
The people at the research lab are awaiting you.
According to dad, it is around here.
I do not think he will cause any problems.
Hey, is that the first thing you say?
I do not understand why I should kill it.
That is why I cannot shoot.
As long as it moves... it does not have to be a living target, right?
I do not understand the reason, so
To eliminate your irregularities as a contractor.
You took the flowers in the bathroom, did not you?
We are in the middle of an important family discu
We do not know who BK201's client is,
but it is certain they hid him here to target the goods.
Normally, we would have transported it by air,
but BK201 gets close to his target by blending into the crowd.
There are too many people at the airport.
We will transport it by water this time.
We should just get it over with already.
Says the bum who got his ass kicked by that little kid...
The security is really tight in here.
It will not be long before our wish and her wish come true.
I shot a hole in the hotel's wall and made us stand out.
As long as it is nutritious, it does not matter how it tastes.
So it tastes so bad you have to think the taste does not matter.
Perhaps a bit hard for a first mission.
Are not you spoiling your handyman?
I am paying her in advance.
As a contractor, you take on missions and get paid.
That is why I can definitely do it.
A ship from Section 3 will enter the harbor.
If I can destroy the goods before it arrives in the harbor, there will not be a problem.
you will shoot when they are unloading the goods from the trucks.
My back is pressed by the darkening glow of dusk
Arukidasu kage ga shimesu hou e
I start walking toward where my shadow points
Taenai ikutsu mo no deai to wakare o
Repeating the many, ceaseless encounters and partings
Kurikaeshi doko e mukau no ka
For all people, while they are lost,
tsumi to iu na no sadame o seotte
they bear the fate known as sin
Sore de mo nao ikiru imi o shiru darou
Nevertheless, I will still learn of the meaning to live, right?
Bokura wa sou Day by Day
That is right, Day by Day,
ashita e tsuzuku michi no tochuu de
we are midway on the road leading to tomorrow
Now Say It Again kimi to futari no mama
Now Say It Again, though it would be great if
irareta nara ii no ni naa...
I could remain together with you...
I saw a whale, but I did not take a picture of it.
Now that I think of it, I should have taken a picture.
Oh boy, you really do not know anything.
No one gets angry when they are in an aquarium.
Their hearts melt when they see the fishes swim happily.
All right, what do you say about some ice cream?
I want one with three balls!
I want one as big as a whale!
The foamy meringue shines pearl gray.
Inside the warm oven a golden life is conceived.
The warm, sweet taste does not bring back memories from childhood.
It is time to set sail.
It would have been better if we had never met.
I did not need any memories at all.
